Deal or no deal. They win the Premier League title. But they sell Bukayo Saka. It was posted by the @goalglobal TikTok account at the start of last season and the reactions of those in front of the camera shone a light on just how loved Saka is at Arsenal. The consensus was no deal. It would not be worth it because some things just mean more. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs our star boy, that‚Äôs like your son,‚Äù one of the supporters said.
